title: Lorna Maseko and Bonang put an end to friendship split rumours
text:
Lorna Maseko and Bonang put an end to friendship split rumours share this

Bonang Matheba and Lorna Maseka were known for serving major friendship goals by going on International trips together and spoiling each other, but after the two did not attend each other’s birthday celebrations this year, fans began to wonder whether they were still friends.

The two women also unfollowed each other on Instagram.

Read More: #PassportGangGoals: Bonang and Lorna invade Ibiza

After months of not entertaining their split rumours, Lorna and Bonang finally broke their silence on the matter and poured cold water on the rumours by sending each other sweet messages on Twitter on Thursday.

“Thank you for my gorgeous flowers @bonang_m - to the moon and back,” Lorna captioned a video of the flowers Bonang had sent her as a gift for launching her cookbook.
